title: Titanic
content: A timeless love story unfolds the backdrop of the ill-fated maiden voyage of the Titanic

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
content: The first book in the Harry Potter series, where Harry discovers he is a wizard and attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: Pride and Prejudice
content: Jane Austen's classic novel about love, marriage, and social status in 19th-century England.
